context: In 2024, Five9 operates in highly competitive mature CCaaS market. Named Leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Contact Center as a Service. Competition intensified with major cloud providers (AWS, Google) entering market. AI and automation became key differentiators across all competitors.
